sentences.sContent: There’s a danger of becoming complacent if you win a few games.
sentences.sCn: 赢了几场比赛可能就会变得沾沾自喜。

sentences.sContent: a complacent attitude towards the problem
sentences.sCn: 对问题满不在乎的态度

remMethod.val: 注意不要和complaisant(adj. 随和的)相混

words.tran: 满足地；自满地；沾沾自喜地

trans.tranOther: pleased with a situation, especially something you have achieved, so that you stop trying to improve or change things – used to show disapproval
